title: Koushounin wa Damaranai - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Mature   Mystery   Psychological   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Couple Growth   Crime   Dark   Depictions of Cruelty   Drugs   Lawyers   Modern Day   Organized Crime   Police   Suicides
author: Eda Yuuri   榎田 尤利
description:
A former public prosecutor, and a former lawyer… Mebuki Akira, who is both talented and good-looking, is a person who loathes three things: violence, blackmail, and coercion so much that he finds them nauseating. In order to help those who cannot help themselves, he manages an office called ‘Mebuki Nego Office’ and, as a negotiator, would take up any case, save for international disputes and in-law issues… 

Volume 1: Koushounin wa Damaranai
Volume 2: Koushounin wa Utagawanai
Volume 3: Koushounin wa Furikaeru
Volume 4: Koushounin wa Hamerareru
Volume 5: Koushounin wa Akiramenai
Volume 6 (Extra): Sweeper wa Tokidoki Warau
Volume 7: Koushounin wa Aisareru
Special Volume: Koushounin wa Yasumenai>
